ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well said!  If your normal group is too thick headed to see what you are contributing, then find another group, another guild...whatever it takes.
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...> wrote:
> My advice at the time was to
> get some new friends.
> My advice now is to get some new friends.

Well said! If your normal group is too thick headed
to see what you are contributing, then find another
group, another guild...whatever it takes.

Sometimes it takes an extreme situation ... Screech,
the "get out of death free" song and lullaby, the "nod
song", for as much as we gripe, it has saved my party
once or twice ... body recoveries from a bad place are
much easier with Shaury's ...

Bottom line tho is there are enough people out there
that like having a bard around that you don't have to
stay with a bunch of folks who don't appreciate you.
